title: Speakerine
overview: 1962, Christine, famous speakerine seen as a perfect lady, is mysteriously mugged in RTF's studio. From famous icon from the little screen, she will become a tracked woman, confronted to a violence she wasn't prepared for. Christine's fate is symbolic of the woman's evolution in companies in the 60s and the instrumented power of the TV's world. She will live fights, treasons & political games.
